```{r}
library(rnaGinesis)
library(ggplot2)
library(reshape)
mu <- rnaGinesis::mu
A <- rnaGinesis::A
```

```{r}
simresult <- simulate_and_test(A_tumor  = A[1:100,1:100],
                               mu_tumor = mu[1:100],
                               num.sim  = 10,
                               Samplesize  = 100,
                               scaleFactor = 50,
                               d.params    = c("Tumor"   = .3,
                                               "Stromal" = .3,
                                               "Immune"  = .3,
                                               "Normal"  = .3),
                               noise_setting = 2,
                               seed          = 1234 )

h_RMSE     <- simresult[[1]]
w_cos_dist <- simresult[[2]]

p <- ggplot(data = melt(w_cos_dist),
            aes(y = value,x=X2))
p <- p + geom_violin()
print(p)
```
